full_description:
\n
\n
Job Description: Analyze and Document Functional Requirement Documents and Technical Design specifications. Design documents along with Use Case modeling in UML. Generate SQL queries from Database systems like Teradata, Snowflake, MS SQL, Oracle for Data Analysis, Data interpretation and Data Profiling using statistical and logical methods. Design and develop data warehouse applications using ETL tools like Informatica Power Center, Data Stage, mainframes, SAS, SSAS, OLAP, POWER BI, OBIEE and Tableau. Extract data for creating value added datasets using SQL, R and python. Troubleshoot, analyze and improve PL/SQL performance of reports, dashboards and ETL. Masterâ€™s degree in Science, Technology or Engineering (any) is required. Work location: Skillman, NJ and various unanticipated locations throughout the U.S..
\n
To Apply, Please send resume to HR Dept., ITS Analytics, Inc., 190 Tamarack Cir, 2nd Floor, Skillman, NJ 08558. Please mention the Job Title in the subject
\n
All employees of ITS Analytics, Inc., are automatically enrolled in the employee referral program of the company. Referral fee of $1,000 will be paid if referred candidate is hired by the company
\n
